column4: Is there some sort of nvidia command that edits the Xorg.conf?
Was I supposed to remove ati drivers before installing Nvidia drivers?

use nano and its not an nvidia command - if yorue xorg.conf got overwritten it means there was a problem loading your driver and it overwrote your xorg.conf with a safe default and backed your old one up to xorg.conf.backup
how would I remove the ati drivers?
